column1: 02.  After trial  the  learned  High  Court Judge  convicted  all  Accused Appellants

column2: for  a  lesser  offence  punishable  under  section  314  of the  Penal  Code  on
count No.1  and  convicted all  Appellants on count No.2.  On count No.3,  1st
Appellant was convicted for a  lesser offence punishable  under section  365
